message:
SYSTEM: Vidal.Sep19.pdf: Página 14
Page 14
Query Rewriting Problem
Query Rewriting Problem (QRP):
●
A query Q is a conjunctive query 
over predicates in O
●
Find a conjunctive query Q’ 
expressed in sources in S based on 
rules in M, such that
○
Evaluation of Q’ produces only 
answers of Q
○
Evaluation of Q’ produces all 
the answers of Q given the 
sources in S
Data Integration 
System
Wrapper
Wrapper
Wrapper
Theorem [Levy et al. 1995]
To check if there is a valid rewriting Q’ of Q with at 
most the same number of goals as Q is an 
NP-complete problem.
speaker: SYSTEM
